content:
Hexagram 7 - Unified Action:
Line 1: Begin with small steps and gradually build momentum. Unity and cooperation are essential for success.
Line 2: Encourage open communication and collaboration among team members. This fosters trust and understanding.
Line 3: Maintain a balance between leadership and humility. Recognize the importance of every member's contribution.
Line 4: Take decisive action and demonstrate your commitment to the shared goal.
Line 5: Embrace your role as a leader and guide others with wisdom and compassion.
Line 6: Recognize when it is time to disengage from a situation or effort that no longer serves the greater good.

Hexagram 8 - Holding Together:
Line 1: Seek out and form connections with like-minded individuals. Together, you can achieve great things.
Line 2: Strengthen your relationships and build trust through open communication and shared experiences.
Line 3: Recognize the value of each member's unique talents and contributions to the group.
Line 4: Embrace your role as a leader and guide your team with wisdom and understanding.
Line 5: Foster an environment of unity and cooperation, where everyone's voice is heard and valued.
Line 6: Be aware of potential challenges and obstacles, and work together to overcome them.

Hexagram 9 - Gentle Restraint:
Line 1: Exercise restraint and patience in the face of obstacles or delays. Trust in the process.
Line 2: Utilize your skills and talents to overcome challenges and make progress.
Line 3: Maintain your focus and determination, even when faced with setbacks or disappointments.
Line 4: Recognize the value of persistence and steady effort in achieving your goals.
Line 5: Embrace opportunities for growth and learning, even in the face of adversity.
Line 6: Stay true to your principles and values, even when faced with difficult circumstances.

Hexagram 10 - Treading:
Line 1: Approach new situations with care and caution. Be mindful of the potential consequences of your actions.
Line 2: Treat others with respect and consideration. This fosters positive relationships and connections.
Line 3: Maintain your integrity and principles, even in challenging situations.
Line 4: Exercise caution when faced with potential pitfalls or obstacles. Be prepared for the unexpected.
Line 5: Continue to act with care and respect, even when faced with adversity or opposition.
Line 6: Recognize the importance of maintaining balance and harmony in all aspects of your life.

Hexagram 11 - Harmony:
Line 1: Embrace new beginnings and foster an environment of harmony and cooperation.
Line 2: Cultivate positive relationships and connections, both personally and professionally.
Line 3: Recognize the importance of balance and moderation in all aspects of your life.
Line 4: Maintain a positive attitude and outlook, even in the face of challenges or adversity.
Line 5: Share your successes and good fortune with others, fostering a sense of community and unity.
Line 6: Be aware of potential disruptions to harmony, and work to address and resolve them.

Hexagram 12 - Stagnation:
Line 1: Recognize when a situation or endeavor has become stagnant and take action to create positive change.
Line 2: Seek out new opportunities and experiences to foster growth and development.
Line 3: Be open to change and willing to adapt to new circumstances or challenges.
Line 4: Maintain your resilience and determination, even when faced with setbacks or delays.
Line 5: Recognize the importance of self-care and personal growth in overcoming stagnation.
Line 6: Trust in your ability to create positive change and overcome obstacles.

Now I will change "Youthful Folly" to "Naivety" as you requested.
